import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import myPhoto from './img/2.jpg'; // Import your photo file const LoginPage = () => { const [formData, setFormData,photoUrl] = useState({ email: '', password: '', photoUrl : './img/1.jpg' }); const [error, setError] = useState(''); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: value }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (formData.email === 'Evendango@gmail.com' && formData.password === '123456') { window.location.href = '/home'; } else { setError('Email or password is incorrect'); } }; return ( <>
